mapper.select: select id, order_no, price, profit, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as create_time, user_name, user_id from order_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(*) as total,SUM(price) as totalPrice FROM order_info
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num,SUM(price) AS price FROM order_info WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}
mapper.insert: insert into order_info (order_no, price, profit, create_time, user_name, user_id) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{profit,jdbcType=REAL}, NOW(), #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=TINYINT})
